hero.title: ITHULUZI LEZOMNOTHO OLUHLAZA
hero.paragraph1: INingizimu Afrika nomhlaba wonke sebegudla ukuya ezomnothweni oluhlaza, futhi lokhu kudala amathuba amaningi emabhizinisini emikhakheni yokuvuselela, ukulungisa nokwenza kabusha imikhiqizo.
hero.paragraph2: Sifuna ukwabelana ngala mathuba nawe, ngakho-ke sisiza abantu abangamabhizinisi ukuthi akhule isikhwama sawo somnotho ngokushesha okungu-10 x. Ithuluzi Lezomnotho Oluhlaza lisiza ohulumeni nezikhungo ukuthi zihlele ukuguquka kwazo kuzomnotho oluhlaza. Kusukela ekuqondeni, ebhange lebhizinisi eliluhlaza uzothola ulwazi oluluhlaza, ukusekelwa nokuthuthukiswa ukuze kuguqulwe amamodeli abo ebhizinisi ajwayelekile abe yizomnotho oluhlaza
hero.paragraph3: Sikusiza wena uhlaka lokuqondisisa ngezinyathelo zokuthola izinzuzo zomnotho oluhlaza nokubeka ibhizinisi lakho ukuthi lisebenze emhlabeni oluhlaza

focus.title: Izindawo eziyisishiyagalolunye eziqondiwe zomnotho oluhlaza eNingizimu Afrika
focus.subtitle: (Ingqungquthela Yezomnotho Oluhlaza, 2010)

card1.title: Ngebhizinisi lakho
card1.paragraph1: Umhlaba usuhamba uya ezomnothweni oluhlaza, futhi iNingizimu Afrika kufanele yenze kanjalo uma izoqhubeka nokuhweba emhlabeni jikelele...
card1.paragraph2: Yilapho uza khona. Kodwa uzenza kanjani uqiniseke ukuthi ungathola enye yalolu msebenzi?

card2.title: Ngekusasa lakho
card2.paragraph1: Uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika ukhethe izindawo eziyisishiyagalolunye okufanele zigxile kuzo ekushintsheni kuzomnotho oluhlaza...
card2.paragraph2: Thola amathuba omnotho oluhlaza emkhakheni we-RM.
